00031 #ifndef OPENVAS_MANAGER_LOG_H
00032 #define OPENVAS_MANAGER_LOG_H
00033 
00034 #include <stdio.h>
00035 #include <stdlib.h>
00036 #include <sys/types.h>
00037 #include <unistd.h>
00038 #include <glib.h>
00039 
00046 #define LOG 0
00047 
00051 #define LOG_FILE OPENVAS_LOG_DIR "/openvasmd.comm"
00052 
00053 #if LOG
00054 extern FILE* log_stream;
00055 
00061 #define logf(args...)                                   \
00062   do {                                                  \
00063     if (log_stream)                                     \
00064       {                                                 \
00065         fprintf (log_stream, "%7i  ", (int) getpid());  \
00066         fprintf (log_stream, args);                     \
00067         if (fflush (log_stream) == EOF)                 \
00068           {                                             \
00069             fclose (log_stream);                        \
00070             log_stream = 0;                             \
00071             g_warning ("%s: fflush failed, so turned off comm logging: %s\n", \
00072                        __FUNCTION__,                    \
00073                        strerror (errno));               \
00074           }                                             \
00075       }                                                 \
00076   } while (0)
00077 #else
00078 
00081 #define logf(format, args...)
00082 #endif
00083 
00084 #endif
